introduction.section1: Do you want to join us to discover Palawan Island? And more particularly in one of its jewels: El Nido.
introduction.section2: Grab your mask and snorkel or dive in these crystal clear waters that will leave you a lasting impression. Take advantage of the different tours called "Island hopping" to choose what suits you best.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

meta-description: Do you want to join us to discover Palawan Island? And more particularly in one of its jewels: El Nido. Grab your mask and snorkel or dive in these crystal clear waters that will leave you a lasting impression. Take advantage of the different tours called "Island hopping" to choose what suits you best. Through our articles, discover different places to visit. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.

title: Palawan
